definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.chinese: “我一直抖个不停，”一位棕发美眉说。

sentences.english: Then I began chatting with the three girls left.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的三个美眉还要再聊聊。

sentences.english: I just had a super-duper meing in the resturould like.
sentences.chinese: 听说黑涩会美眉我刚刚在餐厅吃了一顿超级大餐。

sentences.english: MM: You mean the lady in red?
sentences.chinese: 你是说穿红衣服的那个美眉吗？

sentences.english: Meimei and her family will visit us soon.
sentences.chinese: 美眉和她的一家人不久将来拜访我们。

sentences.english: Ethan walked right into a tree when he was staring at a beautiful girl.
sentences.chinese: 伊森边走路边看美眉时，竟一头撞上了一颗树。

sentences.english: “All I know is I showed up early,” the redhead said.
sentences.chinese: “我只记得自己来得比较早，”红发美眉说。

sentences.english: Group photo of the schoolgirl beauties and their male boss.

sentences.chinese: 网吧制服美眉和他们的老板的合影。

sentences.english: After many years, according to my memory I can conveniently strike these words to admire the beauties on web.
sentences.chinese: 多年以后，凭记忆信手敲出这些话，赞美网上美眉。

sentences.english: Chinese males like foreign belles, it's their nature.
sentences.chinese: 中国男人喜欢外国美眉，这是本能。

sentences.english: The beauties, always being fingertip and getting angry, but they are delighted in hearts.
sentences.chinese: 美眉总是指尖嗔怒，心中欣喜。

sentences.english: He called his sons, and hoe in hand they began to dig up these MMs with great determination.
sentences.chinese: 愚公下决心率领他的儿子们要用锄头泡到这两个美眉。

sentences.english: BSo, you're going to use Sarah's car to go cruising for chicks?
sentences.chinese: 那你是要开莎拉的车载美眉去兜风吗？

sentences.english: The best looking girls always seem to love the bad guys.
sentences.chinese: 最漂亮的美眉似乎总是喜欢坏小子。

sentences.english: But if you get it right, in both instances women are really impressed.
sentences.chinese: 不过要是你时机把握正确，对于两者美眉都会很受用。

definition: pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
erhua variant of 女孩[nu:3 hai2]
